text: - My name is Lauren Finan.
I am a sourcing recruiter
for AWS Marketplace and Data Exchange.
So, I kind of have a unique experience.
I started out as an intern
with AWS Marketplace in the summer of 2020

and then I was asked to
rejoin the team full time.
(upbeat music)
I originally did my internship online

and then I flew out here
from Nashville, Tennessee
and I'm currently based in Seattle.
So during the internship,

it was more of learning
about the best practices,

how to be a great sourcing
recruiter and finding candidates.
When I came in as full time,
it was more getting those relationships
with the candidates.
(upbeat music)

For some of them, we're the
first people that are speaking

with them sometimes
when they're coming in.

So it's really great
because we get to show them

that we're a partner with them
and help them be comfortable.

And I think that's a
really reward thing about
this position.

The biggest highlight would
probably be meeting my team
in person at our team offsite.
AWS is a great place to grow your career,
especially in recruiting,

because there's so many
people that are on your team

that have diverse
backgrounds in recruiting.

So it's really just learning
from the great talent

and people that are always
there to support you.
